text: Printing a string with a little delay between the chars
I want a text to be displayed as if it is just being typed.
So I need a little delay after every letter.
I tried to do it this way:

code:
import time

text = "Hello, this is a test text to see if all works fine."
for char in text:
   print char,time.sleep(0.2),

text: It works fine, except for one problem.
